title: CarState
description: JSON Schema for state update messages from the entities of type car.

position.description: The current location in the format {'lat': xx, 'lon': xx, 'alt': xx}

speed.description: The (approximated) average speed that the entity moves at.

parcels.description: list with Parcel object(s), can be empty.

capacity.description: maximum capacity for parcels that can be carried simultaneously.

state.description: Current state of the car (idle / moving /... ) --> see: https://github.com/mobil-e-hub/meh/blob/master/sim/README.md#EntityStates
